member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator
member.summary: Generates JSON schemas for Synaxis contracts.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GenerateSchema``1
member.summary: Generates a JSON schema for the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to generate a schema for.
member.returns: The JSON schema as a string.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GenerateSchema(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates a JSON schema for the specified type.
member.param: The type to generate a schema for.
member.returns: The JSON schema as a string.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GenerateV1Schemas(System.String)
member.summary: Generates JSON schemas for all V1 contracts and saves them to the specified directory.
member.param: The directory to save the schemas to.
member.returns: A dictionary of type names to schema file paths.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GenerateV2Schemas(System.String)
member.summary: Generates JSON schemas for all V2 contracts and saves them to the specified directory.
member.param: The directory to save the schemas to.
member.returns: A dictionary of type names to schema file paths.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GetV1Types
member.returns: A collection of V1 contract types.

member.name: M:Synaxis.Contracts.SchemaGenerator.GetV2Types
member.returns: A collection of V2 contract types.

member.summary: Defines common error codes used throughout the Synaxis system.

member.summary: Authentication failed due to invalid credentials.

member.summary: Authorization denied due to insufficient permissions.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.InvalidApiKey
member.summary: API key is invalid or expired.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.RateLimitExceeded
member.summary: Rate limit exceeded for the current user or organization.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.QuotaExceeded
member.summary: Quota exceeded for the current billing period.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.ProviderUnavailable
member.summary: The specified provider is not available.

member.summary: The provider returned an error response.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.ProviderTimeout
member.summary: Timeout occurred while waiting for provider response.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.ModelNotSupported
member.summary: The specified model is not supported by the provider.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.RequiredFieldMissing
member.summary: A required field is missing from the request.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V1.Errors.ErrorCodes.NotFound
member.summary: The requested resource was not found.

member.summary: Gets or initializes the model used for this completion.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of an agent in the system (V2).
member.remarks: V2 Breaking Changes: - Renamed 'Creating' to 'Provisioning' to better reflect cloud-native terminology - Split 'Executing' into 'Running' and 'Processing' for finer granularity - Added 'Draining' status for graceful shutdown

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Provisioning
member.summary: Agent is being provisioned and not yet ready.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Idle
member.summary: Agent is idle and ready to execute tasks.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Running
member.summary: Agent is running but waiting for input.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Processing
member.summary: Agent is actively processing a task.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Draining
member.summary: Agent is draining and will not accept new tasks.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Error
member.summary: Agent has encountered an error and is unavailable.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.AgentStatus.Disabled
member.summary: Agent has been disabled by an administrator.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.EventType
member.summary: Represents the type of domain event (V2).
member.remarks: V2 Breaking Changes: - Values are now explicit for forward compatibility - Added 'System' event type for platform-level events

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.ExecutionStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of an agent execution (V2).
member.remarks: V2 Breaking Changes: - Renamed 'InProgress' to 'Running' for consistency with agent status - Added 'Paused' status for suspending execution - Added 'Timeout' status for explicit timeout handling

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.ExecutionStatus.Pending
member.summary: Execution is pending and has not started yet.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.ExecutionStatus.Paused
member.summary: Execution has been paused and can be resumed.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.ExecutionStatus.Failed
member.summary: Execution has failed with an error.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.UserStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a user in the system (V2).
member.remarks: V2 Breaking Changes: - Renamed 'Deactivated' to 'Inactive' for clarity - Removed 'Pending' status (users are now immediately Active or require explicit approval) - Added 'PendingVerification' for email verification flow

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.UserStatus.PendingVerification
member.summary: User account is pending email verification.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.UserStatus.Active
member.summary: User account is active and can access the system.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.UserStatus.Suspended
member.summary: User account has been suspended by an administrator.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.UserStatus.Inactive
member.summary: User account has been marked as inactive.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.WorkflowStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a workflow (V2).
member.remarks: V2: No breaking changes, added 'Scheduled' status for future execution.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.WorkflowStatus.Scheduled
member.summary: Workflow is scheduled for future execution.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.WorkflowStatus.Pending
member.summary: Workflow is pending and has not started yet.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.WorkflowStatus.Failed
member.summary: Workflow has failed with an error.

member.name: F:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.Common.WorkflowStatus.Paused
member.summary: Workflow is paused and can be resumed.

member.summary: Email address of the created user.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.DomainEvents.UserDeleted
member.summary: Event raised when a user is deleted (V2).
member.remarks: V2 Breaking Changes: - Email is now optional (may not be available for GDPR deletion) - Added Anonymized flag for GDPR compliance - Added DataRetentionPeriod for compliance

member.name: P:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.DomainEvents.UserDeleted.Email
member.summary: Email address of the deleted user (null if anonymized).

member.summary: Whether user data was anonymized for GDPR compliance.

member.name: P:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.DomainEvents.UserDeleted.DataRetentionPeriod
member.summary: Data retention period for soft-deleted users.

member.name: T:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.DomainEvents.UserUpdated
member.summary: Event raised when a user is updated (V2).

member.name: P:Synaxis.Contracts.V2.DomainEvents.UserUpdated.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the user was last updated.
